name: LivebornNewbornBornInHospital
title: Liveborn Newborn Born in Hospital
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses that are commonly used in the inpatient setting for newborn live born, and born in hospital. This value set contains ICD-9-CM codes.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have active diagnosis, mapped to QDM "Diagnosis Active."),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD-9-CM codes from V30 to V39. Only includes the patients born in hospital.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes newborn born before admission to hospital and born outside hospital and not hospitalized.)
